title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente. Fry bacon until crisp. Whisk eggs and parmesan, then combine off heat with pasta and bacon. Season to taste.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables. Stir-fry garlic then veggies. Add soy sauce and cook until tender-crisp. Serve over rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs. Mix in flour and chips. Scoop onto baking sheet and bake at 350°F for 10–12 minutes.
